title: I got a reward but don't know how to claim it
body: so i went onto league today and it said i have a reward in the top right with a chest icon but i cannot find how to redeem it... plz help

replies.body: never mind i just had to click the icon when it showed up :)
Glad to see you found your reward! For future reference, all of your gifts from friends and rewards like icons will be in your notifications. Just click on that pop up and it'll grant you the item!
